HediffDef.label: advanced bionic construction arm
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced bionic construction arm. A highly advanced artificial arm made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with strength capable of crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe arm houses a wide range of tools commonly used in a variety of construction tasks attached to telescoping appendages capable of independent movement. It allows the user to perform several tasks simultaneously greatly increasing their working speed.

HediffDef.label: advanced bionic power arm
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced bionic power arm. A highly advanced artificial arm made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with strength capable of crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe arm has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to significantly increase the strength beyond the normal output for use in close quarters combat. It houses a retractable crystal-metallic blade infused with mechanites that maintains a mono-molecular cutting edge for cleaving through ultratech armor.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic power arm

Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe arm has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to significantly increase the strength beyond the normal output for use in close quarters combat. It houses a retractable crystal-metallic blade infused with mechanites that maintains a mono-molecular cutting edge for cleaving through ultratech armor.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced bionic power arm
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced bionic power arm.

HediffDef.label: advanced bionic breaching arm
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced bionic breaching arm. A highly advanced artificial arm made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with strength capable of crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe arm has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to significantly increase the strength beyond the normal output for use in close quarters combat and demolition. Upon impact the hand vents out a concussion force from the pores on the skin which specializes in demolishing walls and structures.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic breaching arm
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced artificial arm made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with strength capable of crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe arm has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to significantly increase the strength beyond the normal output for use in close quarters combat and demolition. Upon impact the hand vents out a concussion force from the pores on the skin which specializes in demolishing walls and structures.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced bionic breaching arm
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced bionic breaching arm.

HediffDef.label: advanced bionic shocker arm
HediffDef.description:
An installed advanced bionic shocker arm. A highly advanced artificial arm made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with strength capable of crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.

The arm has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to unleash a devastating electrical shock capable of rendering even large animals unconscious. Its only design flaw is the unit requires a few moments to gather the necessary energy to discharge an attack which leaves the user temporarily vulnerable. It’s also capable of unleashing low level electromagnetic pulses through impacts without interfering with the unit’s primary function.

Note: Rimworld has a built-in instant death chance when enemies are downed that scales with population. To bypass this mechanic and use this bionic without randomly killing enemies you'll need to use a mod or tweak your storyteller settings to remove the instant down chance.

Its only design flaw is the unit requires a few moments to gather the necessary energy to discharge an attack which leaves the user temporarily vulnerable. HediffDef.label: advanced bionic shocker jaw
HediffDef.description:
An installed advanced shocker jaw. A highly advanced artificial jaw made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It has a crushing strength capable of shattering bones and crushing hardwood branches. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.

The jaw has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to unleash a devastating electrical shock capable of rendering even large animals unconscious. Its only design flaw is the unit requires a few moments to gather the necessary energy to discharge an attack which leaves the user temporarily vulnerable. It’s also capable of unleashing low level electromagnetic pulses through bites without interfering with the unit’s primary function.

Note: Rimworld has a built-in instant death chance when enemies are downed that scales with population. To bypass this mechanic and use this bionic without randomly killing enemies you'll need to use a mod or tweak your storyteller settings to remove the instant down chance.

The jaw has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to unleash a devastating electrical shock capable of rendering even large animals unconscious. Its only design flaw is the unit requires a few moments to gather the necessary energy to discharge an attack which leaves the user temporarily vulnerable. It’s also capable of unleashing low level electromagnetic pulses through bites without interfering with the unit’s primary function.

Note: Rimworld has a built-in instant death chance when enemies are downed that scales with population. To bypass this mechanic and use this bionic without randomly killing enemies you'll need to use a mod or tweak your storyteller settings to remove the instant down chance.

AbilityDef.label: shock blast
AbilityDef.description: Unleash an immense electrical shock on a target to incapacitate them.

HediffDef.label: electric shock
HediffDef.description: The lingering effects of an immense electrical shock that incapacitates a target.

HediffDef.label: advanced bionic cleaner leg
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced bionic cleaner leg. A highly advanced artificial leg made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with speed fast enough to keep pace with cars. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe leg houses a wide range of tools commonly used in a variety of cleaning tasks attached to telescoping appendages capable of independent movement. It allows the user to perform several tasks simultaneously greatly increasing their working speed.

HediffDef.label: advanced bionic power leg
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced bionic power leg. A highly advanced artificial leg made using cutting edge ultratech techniques. It provides smooth micrometre precision motor control with speed fast enough to keep pace with cars. The synthetic flesh looks and feels just like natural flesh, but it’s as hard as plasteel. Through the use of a lattice-dust healing system its capable of repairing itself over time.\n\nThe leg has a reinforced design for enhanced durability and makes use of an isolated self-charging power system to significantly increase the strength beyond the normal output for use in close quarters combat. It houses sets of retractable crystal-metallic spikes in the knee and foot; they’re infused with mechanites that maintains a mono-molecular cutting edge for cleaving through ultratech armor.

It houses sets of retractable crystal-metallic spikes in the knee and foot; they’re infused with mechanites that maintains a mono-molecular cutting edge for cleaving through ultratech armor.
